title: Sampler, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: solid cross-stitch on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 41 x 41.5 cm (16 1/8 x 16 5/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Landscape with house, trees and horse-drawn coach in the distance; hunter, stag and bird on tree in the foreground.
